questions.question: Frequency response test is not suitable for systems with ___________.
The corner frequency for the polar factor 1/ (S + 5) is ____________.
The system's phase margin is 0 degrees. The system's nature is _____.

explanations.a: gain margin and phase margin are not 0
explanations.b: gain margin and phase margin are not 0
explanations.c: gain margin and phase margin are 0
explanations.d: gain margin and phase margin are not 0

questions.question: For a second order system with an undamped natural frequency of 8 rad/sec. and a damping ratio of 0.5, the resonant frequency in rad/sec. is .________.
A transfer function which has all its poles and zeros only in the left half of the S-plane is called ________ transfer function.

explanations.a: does not have all its poles and zeroes in the left half of the s-plane
explanations.b: has all its poles and zeroes in the left half of the s-plane
explanations.c: does not have all its poles and zeroes in the left half of the s-plane
